turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about XDISCIPLEx A.D..
turn.1: What was XDISCIPLEx A.D.'s music style?
turn.2: XDISCIPLEx A.D. xDISCIPLEx A.D.(or xdisciplex a.d.) was a straight edge Christian hardcore band from Erie, Pennsylvania.
turn.3: What is the name of the band?
turn.4: Formerly xdisciplex or disciple, the band had to change its name to avoid legal actions due to a prior established band named Disciple.
turn.5: Did the band release any albums?
turn.6: They released albums with Goodfellow Records, Triple Crown Records and Facedown Records.
turn.8: After they disbanded, Dan Quiggle, Dave Quiggle, and Adam Salaga started another band called Jesus Wept, while Neil Hartman joined No Innocent Victim.
turn.9: Was anyone from the band arrested for anything?
turn.10: Dave Quiggle moved to California during the summer of 2005 and also joined No Innocent Victim and works for Facedown Records doing design.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: Members of xDISCIPLEx A.D. also played in the bands Anchor, Dodgin' Bullets and Shockwave.
